title: bitwebs_net
author: bitwebs_net
content: BITWEBS.net:Buy, Sell and Auction Websites, Domains, and Scripts with bitcoin for FREE and chat with Internet Entrepreneurs around the world!Features:Escrow - Escrow service which guarantees both parties are satisfied and safe in the dealingsSecure - We offer an anonymous service and many security features such as 2FA.Verified - We are a verified community and thoroughly validate authenticity of our inventory.Dedicated support - We have a dedicated team and hard working agents that will resolve your inquiries in minutesInstant - Start selling, bidding, offering, and buying in minutes! Instant notifications and emails!Referral system - Share your referral link with a friend and earn bitcoin every time a referred user makes a successful sale!What are you waiting for? Join us today!https://bitwebs.net/sign-up

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: bitwebs_net on September 18, 2022, 05:50:28 AMand ScriptsI was surprised to see you've also included some questionable script categories [in case you didn't know, by providing a platform for such deals you're indirectly helping scammers to execute their plans]!Quote from: bitwebs_net on September 18, 2022, 05:50:28 AMEscrow - Escrow service which guarantees both parties are satisfied and safe in the dealingsYou might want to provide a detailed explanation with regard to the whole process [e.g. how escrow providers are chosen, steps and etc...].

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: ETFbitcoin on September 19, 2022, 11:56:55 AMI also didn't expect HYIP/doubler script category which deemed as shady/questionable. But what actually surprise me is there are listing for "[COIN NAME] Fake Giveaway Script" which obviously will be used for scamming people.For just $6, anyone can start his own scam business. magnificently.Also, next to HYIP, several scripts that are offered are nulled (it certainly does not have permission to resell licences), and OP (seller) has a very low honour threshold. what could go wrong if his escrow was used?

comments.author: bitwebs_net
comments.body: Quote from: ETFbitcoin on September 19, 2022, 11:56:55 AMIMO you should add details about how much someone could earn when referred user makes a successful sale.Referrers get 1% of every sale. Thanks for this suggestion, I've now added it to our homepage.Quote from: SFR10 on September 18, 2022, 05:50:28 AMEscrow - Escrow service which guarantees both parties are satisfied and safe in the dealingsYou might want to provide a detailed explanation with regard to the whole process [e.g. how escrow providers are chosen, steps and etc...].As of right now, anybody can register for free and sell on the platform. Quote from: examplens on September 20, 2022, 11:15:17 AMFor just $6, anyone can start his own scam business. magnificently.Also, next to HYIP, several scripts that are offered are nulled (it certainly does not have permission to resell licences), and OP (seller) has a very low honour threshold. what could go wrong if his escrow was used?We are an open market for all websites/domains/scripts to be sold. Scripts are delivered instantly after purchase.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: ETFbitcoin on September 19, 2022, 11:56:55 AMBut what actually surprise me is there are listing for "[COIN NAME] Fake Giveaway Script" which obviously will be used for scamming people.Good catch [it's still there]... Based on how OP responded in the "latter part" of his/her comment and the above example, it clearly shows OP has no problem with feeding scammers the necessary tools to achieve their objectives [SMH]!Quote from: bitwebs_net on September 25, 2022, 05:31:33 AMAs of right now, anybody can register for free and sell on the platform. But this still doesn't answer my question!

comments.author: bitwebs_net
comments.body:
Quote from: ETFbitcoin on September 25, 2022, 08:13:32 AMA question, how would you handle if the script is fake (e.g. only contain

do you really think you can get script for $6?

) or defective (e.g. cannot show crypocurrency address at all)?Good question, all scripts are reviewed by our team for authenticity before they become live on the platform.
